post.text: JOIN THE MOVEMENT! Check out Wisconsin!!  THANK YOU!!

comment.author: Brittany
comment.text: If you wanna do something good get rid of Obama care if you're elected so I can actually get medicines and medical help without being in debt forever

replies.author: Kyle
replies.text: Obama care is disappearing, another company today folded saying they were out. That doesn't leave much more, Trump will difently get rid of it

replies.author: Aspen
replies.text: That's so right what you said, I can't even go to Dr. anymore without running up a F- large bill so I just don't go
